Interface BlackjackStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicBlackjackStrategy, ComputerBlackjackStrategy, SimpleBlackjackStrategy
public interface BlackjackStrategy

BlackjackStrategy implements a blackjack player. All memory of previously played cards is encapsulated by the class BlackjackCardCounter.
An implementation of BlackjackStrategy should have a constructor with the arguments BlackjackVariation and BlackjackCardCounter and throw an error if these arguments provides insufficient support.
The methods are called in the order split, surrender, doubleUp, hit.

Author:
Jesper Kristensen
See Also:
BlackjackCardCounter, BlackjackVariation

Method Detail

bet

int bet(int capitalLeft)
Determiness the amount of money to bet. The amount should be valid according to the instance of BlackjackVariation applied at construction time. Also, it should be no larger than capitalLeft. If an invalid bet is made it will be replaced by the minimum allowed bet.

Parameters:
capitalLeft - the money available to the player.
Returns:
the amount of money to bet

init

void init(int upcard,
          int card1,
          int card2)
init is called after cards have been dealt and before any decisions have been maken.

Parameters:
upcard - the card in front of the dealer.
card1 - the players first card.
card2 - the players second card.

split

boolean split(int upcard,
              int pair)
Todo: This decision should also be based on the amount of money the player has left.

Parameters:
upcard - the card in front of the dealer.
pair - the card that the players has paired.
Returns:
true iff the pair should be split.

surrender

boolean surrender(int upcard,
                  int total,
                  boolean soft)
Parameters:
upcard - the card in front of the dealer.
total - the (best) sum of the players cards.
soft - true iff it's a soft total.
Returns:
true iff the hand should be surrendered.

doubleUp

boolean doubleUp(int upcard,
                 int total,
                 boolean soft)
Parameters:
upcard - the card in front of the dealer.
total - the (best) sum of the players cards.
soft - true iff it's a soft total.
Returns:
true iff the hand should be doubled.

hit

boolean hit(int upcard,
            int total,
            boolean soft)
Parameters:
upcard - the card in front of the dealer.
total - the (best) sum of the players cards.
soft - true iff it's a soft total.
Returns:
true iff another card should be received.

insure

boolean insure(int total,
               boolean soft)
Parameters:
total - the (best) sum of the players cards.
soft - true iff it's a soft total.
Returns:
true iff an insurance wish to be made.
